EmailTemplate.name: Increase/Change AB Credit
EmailTemplate.subject: Increase/Change AB Credit - Account {!Account.Cust_ID__c} - {!Account.Name}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<Please send to additional cc to bsdcredlineincr@officedepot.com and remove this section>
Team, Please make the following changes to Account - {!Account.AOPS_Cust_Id__c} - {Account.Name}:
New Credit Line: Projected monthly spend: One-Time or Permanent Change?: AP Contact Name: Phone - Fax - AP contact Email - DUNS number - {!Account.Duns_Number__c} Company website - {!Account.Website}
